description: This file defines the DealService class which extends a generic CRUDService to provide operations related to 'Deal' objects in a CRM platform. It includes methods to perform calculations, like predicting the total amount forecast for deals, possibly filtering by pipeline. It also instantiates a DealService object.

classes.name: DealService
classes.description: A service class for handling CRUD operations and business logic related to Deal objects, extending a generic CRUDService.

methods.name: float amount_forecast(self, db: Session, pipeline_id: Optional[int] = None)
methods.description: Calculates the sum of amounts adjusted by stage probability for open deals, optionally filtered by pipeline ID.
